description: face of white and light blue clown on front of yellow and red rectangular box; clown's hands hang down to bottom; black base to box
inscription:
Inscription and Sticker

on front side of box, below lever: [Just to see my tongue appear, / press the lever down. / I will save your pennies dear, / I\'m Jolly Joe, the clown.]
markings: on bottom, on sticker: [Jolly Joe, the / A.D clown / 132G 7-4-11 / 22.1700 7600 / 1200 / Moster 801500]
title: "Jolly Joe Clown Bank" mechanical bank
